verify_email.instructions: We’ve sent a confirmation link. Don’t see it? Check your spam folder.

hero.title: UDocument: 8+ years of legal practice –
hero.subtitle_line1: Professional support for real estate transactions and corporate law in Ukraine. Assistance with notarized documents and apostilles in Great Britain. Our unique technology allows you to generate necessary documents online — quickly, accurately, and under the supervision of experienced lawyers.

trustSection.title: With us it's —
trustSection.description: We have combined 8 years of legal experience with our unique technology to guarantee the legal accuracy of every document.
trustSection.descriptionStrong: UDocument is a modern approach to law where your time, security, and quality are the top priority.

ourBenefitsSection.title: The result you get with UDocument:

features.lawDef: Full legal support and security for real estate transactions in Ukraine.
features.structure: A clear business structure and expert guidance in corporate law.
features.contracts: Instant generation of legally accurate documents online with expert review.
features.notaryServices: Fast processing of notarial documents, translations, and apostilles in Great Britain.

why_choose_us.title: Why Choose UDocument?
why_choose_us.subtitle: We have transformed complex legal processes into simple and reliable solutions.

advantages.title: Experience, Amplified by AI
advantages.text: Our 8+ years of legal practice are combined with AI technologies to solve your tasks faster and more efficiently.

advantages.title: Instant Online Generation
advantages.text: Create legally sound documents in minutes. Our assistant will guide you through the process step-by-step.

advantages.title: Legal Accuracy and Relevance
advantages.text: All our documents and consultations comply with the current legislation of Ukraine. This is guaranteed by our 'dual control': lawyer and technology.

advantages.title: Comprehensive Business Support
advantages.text: From company registration to ongoing legal support. We cover all your business's legal needs in one place.

advantages.title: Security in Real Estate Transactions
advantages.text: We protect your interests at every stage: from property verification to the final agreement. Your investment is securely protected.

advantages.title: Service Between Ukraine and Britain
advantages.text: We build a legal bridge between the two countries: from apostilles and document notarization in Great Britain to their use in Ukraine.

advantages.title: Transparency and Confidentiality
advantages.text: We operate with clear pricing without hidden fees. Your data and cases are kept under strict protection and are completely confidential.

faq.title: Step 1: Account Registration
faq.description: Create a personal account using your email address. This is your secure space for working with documents.

faq.title: Step 2: Email Confirmation
faq.description: We will send you a verification email. Simply click the link within it to activate and secure your account.

faq.title: Step 3: Document Selection
faq.description: In your personal account, you will find a catalog of available legal documents. Choose the one that meets your needs.

faq.title: Step 4: Data Entry
faq.description: Our online assistant will ask you a few simple questions. Prepare the necessary data (e.g., passport and tax ID number) to make the process even faster.

faq.title: Step 5: Generation and Download
faq.description: Click the 'Generate' button. Your document will be created instantly and available for download in PDF format, fully ready for printing and use.

legal_support.title: Legal Support for Businesses and Individuals
legal_support.intro_text: Full range of legal services. Real solutions and support at all stages.

services.name: Business Registration
services.desc: Ukraine and abroad (LLC, Sole Proprietorship, representative offices).

services.name: Contract Development and Analysis
services.desc: sales and purchase, lease, services, etc.

services.name: Representation in State Bodies
services.desc: courts, tax authorities, AMCU (Antimonopoly Committee of Ukraine).

real_estate_services.title: Real Estate Legal Services in Ukraine
real_estate_services.intro_text: Comprehensive legal support for real estate matters: from documents to transaction support. Residential and commercial properties.

services.name: Registration of Property Rights
services.desc: preparation and submission of documents, registration in registries.

services.name: Real Estate Consolidation/Division
services.desc: technical documentation, new addresses, registration of rights.

services.name: Technical Passports and Reports
services.desc: for residential/non-residential premises, for transactions and registration.

services.name: Legal Analysis of Real Estate Transactions
services.desc: document verification, property history checks for investment security.

online_generation.title: AI-Powered Online Legal Document Generation
online_generation.how_it_works_text: A convenient service for quickly creating legally correct documents online. Templates by experienced lawyers, enhanced by AI. Enter data, confirm email – get PDF.

generator_advantages.text: Generate after simple email verification. Try it!

generator_advantages.highlight: Up to 3 free documents/week for registered users:
generator_advantages.text: Plus access to generation history in your personal account.
Documents from leading lawyers, notaries, updated by AI in accordance with Ukrainian legislation.
Access to more complex documents at a favorable price.

privacy_policy.meta_description: Official Privacy Policy of UDocument. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal data in accordance with Ukrainian law.
privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.introduction_text: Welcome to UDocument! This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our website and services. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal data in accordance with the Law of Ukraine 'On Personal Data Protection' and generally accepted international standards.
privacy_policy.data_collection_text: We may collect the following categories of personal data:
data_collection_list: Personal Identification Information: name, surname, patronymic, email address, phone number, passport details, identification number (RNOKPP), which you provide during registration or document generation.
Data for Documents: any information you enter into forms to create legal documents (e.g., real estate details, information about the parties to an agreement, etc.).
Technical Information: IP address, browser type, operating system, visit data (including URLs), and cookies to improve the service.
privacy_policy.data_usage_text: Your data is used exclusively for the following purposes:
data_usage_list: Providing and Improving Services: to create and manage your account, generate legal documents, provide consultations, and offer technical support.
Communication: to send service notifications, registration confirmations, respond to your inquiries, and inform you about updates to our services.
Security: to protect our platform from fraud and abuse.
Analytics: to analyze service usage for its improvement and optimization (data is used in an anonymous, aggregated form).
privacy_policy.data_commitment_text: We guarantee that your personal data will NOT be sold, rented, or used for any commercial purposes not related to the provision of UDocument services.
privacy_policy.data_protection_text: We implement modern technical and organizational security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Data is stored on secure servers. We retain your data only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, or as required by law.
privacy_policy.user_rights_text: In accordance with the legislation of Ukraine, you have the right to:
user_rights_list: Know the sources of collection, the location of your personal data, and the purpose of its processing.
Request the correction of inaccurate data or the deletion of your data.
Withdraw consent for the processing of personal data.
Lodge complaints regarding the processing of your data with the Ukrainian Parliament Commissioner for Human Rights or in court.
privacy_policy.cookies_text: We use cookies to ensure the functionality of the site and improve your experience. These are small text files stored on your device. You can manage cookie settings in your browser.
privacy_policy.changes_text: We may update this Policy from time to time. All changes will become effective upon their publication on this page. We recommend that you review it regularly to stay informed of the current version.
privacy_policy.contact_us_text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us by email:

signup.meta_title: Sign Up for a New Account
